content: {"name": "South Hall Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hall County Residents; first visit need to show photo ID and SS cards for household residents", "email": "", "url": "http://www.shcfp.org/our-services.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4211 Walnut Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Oakwood", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30566", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 34.2275957, "longitude": -83.8834643}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 865-6588", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
